title: Bug 49102coyote.ajp.Constants  3 "constant" arrays are mutable
description: Bug 49102coyote.ajp.Constants3 "constant" arrays are mutable The class coyote.ajp.Constants contains 3 public static nonempty String[] arrays:methodTransArrayresponseTransArrayheaderTransArrayresponseTransArray only appears to be locally, so could be made private.The others are used in index lookups, so get(index) methods could be used to protect them.
